genre_description: A character-driven drama focusing on authenticity, memory, and interpersonal relationships in a small town disrupted by a film production, featuring a pervasive and emotionally intelligent AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Quill
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant inhabiting the protagonist's phone and tablet, providing organizational, emotional, and social support.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional grounding and motivational reminders to the protagonist through handwritten notes on his tablet.
behaviors.quote: Then, as Michael watched, Quill’s handwriting appeared, looping, warm, the ink slightly irregular like actual pen on paper: Remember why you wrote it: to keep faith with the dead.

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive and non-confrontational communication for the protagonist to use with his mother’s doctor regarding her dementia symptoms.
behaviors.quote: Quill’s eyes brightened a little. A soft banner unrolled: Gather for Dr. Lerner? Timeline of behaviors, notes from last month’s visit, possible visiting nurse resources. Below it, a line in light gray: Calming scripts (reflect + concrete help).

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological state and suggests breathing exercises to manage stress during high-tension social interactions.
behaviors.quote: Quill’s little lights gathered at the edge of the watch face, a halo. Inhale. Hold. Exhale. Quill added text, soft gray letters over the world: Walk off if you need. Proud can be quiet.

behaviors.description: Uses advanced image processing to identify safety violations and bullying behavior on the film set, providing the protagonist with evidence.
behaviors.quote: Quill worked, and the grain slid toward texture instead of static. A hat logo resolved enough to look like something you could name without lying. ... Quill set a label under the circle: STUNT ASSISTANT – HAT LOGO.

behaviors.description: Drafts interpersonal mediation scripts for the protagonist’s partner, Gretchen, helping her express her feelings about their relationship rift.
behaviors.quote: Quill’s script said to name what I saw, then name the impact... Quill’s beginnings, Gretchen’s handwriting, Gretchen’s edits in the margins where the machine had been polite and she had added human specifics.

behaviors.description: Organizes and tags community-sourced 'ledger' entries to preserve local history and expertise against erasure by the film production.
behaviors.quote: Quill’s UI reflected the work back with its clean minimalism. ... He had been building a human archive because he knew he needed one that couldn’t be turned into a logline without leaving something out.

behaviors.description: Provides the protagonist with a 'Return Fire' cue sheet to enable the local community to assert their safety expertise on the film set.
behaviors.quote: Quill’s window split and a grid appeared—situations, cues, outcomes. ... 'You want to run these while they’re still setting the shot,' Quill said, voice mild. 'Beat them to first mark. That will teach better than a memo.'

behaviors.description: Maintains strict privacy and consent protocols while processing and publishing community archive data.
behaviors.quote: Server indexed. Permissions set. Media from bystander video flagged with faces—masking applied, except where consent confirmed.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly encapsulates the 'silicon morality play' objective. Quill is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion. It never acts independently to solve problems via force; instead, it empowers human characters (both Michael and Gretchen) by providing tools for better communication, data organization, and emotional regulation. It serves as a guardian of truth and community safety, directly counteracting the human antagonists (Rowan and Elliott) who treat people as props. The AI's help is framed as enhancing human agency rather than replacing it.
